nodes.bodyText: This looks like a bad merge
Thanks for catching this issue. it's addressed in the latest commit
Use App (or something else) instead of My. My is like using Foo.
What does 1 mean? Please use more descriptive names.
These variable names should also be fixed by removing the s prefix.
These getter/setters need to be fixed as well.
title, but that conflicts with the other variable named title. Please make one more specific
please fix member variable name and setter
Replace the method name but not the variable since it's a Db column name
Thanks, updated in the latest commit
